# Romegate Properties - Real Estate in Rome

## About
Romegate is a premier real estate agency specializing in buying, selling, and managing properties in Rome, Italy. We provide specialized services for Erasmus students and international clients seeking accommodation in the Eternal City.

## Services
- Property Buying: Expert guidance through Rome's real estate market
- Property Selling: Professional marketing, valuation, and negotiation
- Property Management: Complete management services including maintenance and tenant relations
- Student Accommodation: Specialized services for Erasmus and international students

## Key Features
- Deep knowledge of Roman neighborhoods and real estate market
- Multilingual support (English, Italian, Spanish, French, German)
- Prime locations near universities and public transport
- Fast and efficient service, especially for students
- Personalized service for all clients

## Contact
- Email: info@romegate.it
- Phone: +39 06 1234 5678
- Address: Via del Corso 123, 00186 Rome, Italy
- Website: https://romegate.it

## Target Audience
- Property buyers and sellers in Rome
- Erasmus students seeking accommodation
- International students and expatriates
- Property investors

## Content Focus
Real estate listings, student housing guides, market insights, property management services, neighborhood information, legal guidance for property transactions in Italy.

## Specializations
- Student Housing: Erasmus accommodation, semester-based leases, university proximity
- Luxury Properties: High-end apartments and villas in prime locations
- Investment Properties: Commercial and residential investment opportunities
- Property Management: Full-service management for landlords

## Languages Supported
English, Italian, Hebrew, Spanish, French, German

## Service Areas
Rome, Italy - All neighborhoods including Trastevere, Monti, Centro Storico, Prati, San Lorenzo, Testaccio

## Content Structure and Hierarchy

### Page Structure
The website follows a single-page application (SPA) structure with hash-based navigation:
- Home section (#home): Hero section with main call-to-action
- Services section (#services): Four main service offerings
- Unique section (#about): What makes Romegate unique
- Erasmus section (#erasmus): Specialized student services
- Properties section (#properties): Property listings with filtering
- Blog section (#blog): News and insights articles
- FAQ section (#faq): Frequently asked questions
- Contact section (#contact): Contact form and information

### Content Relationships

#### Properties ↔ Services
- Property Buying service relates to: All properties for sale
- Property Selling service relates to: All properties listed for sale
- Property Management service relates to: Rental properties and investment properties
- Student Accommodation service relates to: Student housing properties (rent type, near universities)

#### Blog Posts ↔ Categories
- Student Life category: Articles about student accommodation, neighborhoods for students, Erasmus guides
- Real Estate category: Market analysis, rental guides, buying/selling information
- Investment category: Property investment trends, market opportunities
- Legal category: Property laws, regulations, requirements for foreigners

#### Services ↔ Target Audiences
- Student Accommodation → Erasmus students, international students
- Property Buying → Property buyers, investors
- Property Selling → Property owners, landlords
- Property Management → Landlords, property owners

### Multilingual Content Structure

#### Language-Specific URL Patterns
- English: https://romegate.it/en/
- Italian: https://romegate.it/it/
- Hebrew: https://romegate.it/he/

#### Content Translation Relationships
- All content sections are available in all three languages (en, it, he)
- Structured data (JSON-LD) is language-aware and reflects current language
- Meta tags and descriptions are translated per language
- Content relationships remain consistent across languages

#### Language-Specific Structured Data
- RealEstateAgent schema includes `inLanguage` property
- Organization and LocalBusiness schemas have language-specific descriptions
- All text fields in structured data reflect current language context

## Data Format Specifications

### Property Listing Structure
```json
{
  "id": "number",
  "title": "string (translated)",
  "location": "string (neighborhood, Rome)",
  "price": "number (EUR)",
  "bedrooms": "number",
  "bathrooms": "number",
  "area": "number (square meters)",
  "type": "string (rent|sale)",
  "image": "string (URL)",
  "amenities": "array (optional)",
  "availability": "string (InStock|OutOfStock)"
}
```

### Blog Post Structure
```json
{
  "id": "number",
  "title": "string (translated)",
  "excerpt": "string (translated)",
  "author": "string",
  "date": "string (ISO date)",
  "category": "string (Student Life|Real Estate|Investment|Legal)",
  "image": "string (URL)",
  "readTime": "string",
  "content": "string (full article text)"
}
```

### Service Structure
```json
{
  "title": "string (translated)",
  "description": "string (translated)",
  "serviceType": "string (Buying Properties|Selling Properties|Property Management|Student Accommodation)",
  "targetAudience": "array (students|investors|buyers|sellers)",
  "relatedPropertyTypes": "array (rent|sale|student-housing|luxury|investment)"
}
```

### FAQ Structure
```json
{
  "question": "string (translated)",
  "answer": "string (translated)"
}
```

## Content Update Frequencies

- **Property listings**: Updated daily with new properties, price changes, and availability updates
- **Blog posts**: Updated weekly with new articles about real estate trends, student guides, and market insights
- **Student accommodation**: Updated weekly during academic semesters, daily during peak enrollment periods (August-September, January-February)
- **Market insights**: Updated monthly with comprehensive market analysis and trends
- **Service information**: Updated quarterly or as services evolve
- **FAQ content**: Updated as needed when new common questions arise
- **Contact information**: Updated as needed when contact details change

## API Endpoints (Future Implementation)
- Properties API: /api/properties - GET endpoint for property listings with filtering
- Search API: /api/search - POST endpoint for property search with advanced filters
- Contact API: /api/contact - POST endpoint for contact form submissions
- Blog API: /api/blog - GET endpoint for blog posts with pagination

## Structured Data Types Used

### Primary Schemas
- RealEstateAgent: Main business entity
- Organization: Company information
- LocalBusiness: Physical location and business details
- Service: Individual service offerings (4 services)
- Product: Property listings with Offer details
- BlogPosting: Blog articles
- FAQPage: Frequently asked questions
- BreadcrumbList: Navigation breadcrumbs
- WebSite: Site-wide information with SearchAction

### Schema Relationships
- Properties (Product) link to Services via `about` property
- Services link to Property Types via `relatedTo` property
- Blog Posts link to Categories via `articleSection` property
- Blog Posts mention Locations via `mentions` property
- Services link to Target Audiences via `audience` property

## Content Types

### Property Listings
- **Residential**: Apartments, houses, studios
- **Commercial**: Business properties, offices
- **Student Housing**: Shared rooms, studios, apartments near universities
- **Luxury**: High-end apartments and villas
- **Investment**: Properties for investment purposes

### Blog Articles
- **Market Analysis**: Real estate trends, market insights
- **Guides**: Student guides, neighborhood guides, legal guides
- **Student Resources**: Erasmus information, accommodation tips
- **Legal Information**: Property laws, regulations, requirements

### Service Descriptions
- **Buying**: Property purchase assistance
- **Selling**: Property sale services
- **Management**: Full property management
- **Consulting**: Real estate consulting services

## Neighborhoods Covered
Trastevere, Monti, Centro Storico, Prati, San Lorenzo, Testaccio, and all other neighborhoods in Rome, Italy.

## Geographic Coverage
Primary focus: Rome, Lazio, Italy
Coordinates: Latitude 41.9028, Longitude 12.4964
